ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This is a quick and easy soup that won't let you down."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium heat, saute the bacon and onions together until onions are tender, about 7 minutes. Add the corn, potatoes, soup, milk, and salt and pepper. Raise heat to high and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer about 25 to 35 minutes or until the potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
